cluster_id.description: The cluster ID. This parameter is stored as a lowercase string.

engine.description: The name of the cache engine to be used for this cluster.

node_type.description: The compute and memory capacity of the nodes in the node group.

num_cache_nodes.description: The initial number of cache nodes that the cluster has.

port.description: The port number on which each of the cache nodes will accept connections.

family.description: The family of the cache parameter group.

enable_redis_log_delivery.description: Specifies whether to enable Redis log delivery to Amazon CloudWatch Logs.

cloudwatch_retention_in_days.description: Number of days to retain CloudWatch logs

log_format.description: Specifies the format of the logs.

subnet_ids.description: A list of VPC subnet IDs for the ElastiCache subnet group.

use_vpc.description: Enables provisioning the domain inside a VPC. Requires subnet_ids and security_group_ids to be set.

security_group_ids.description: List of security group IDs to be used on ElastiCache cluster. Requires vpc_options to be set.

az_mode.description: Specifies whether the nodes in this Memcached cluster are created in a single Availability Zone or created across multiple Availability Zones in the cluster's region.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

user_id.description: The user ID of the owner of the cluster.

user_name.description: The user name of the owner of the cluster.

access_string.description: The access string of the owner of the cluster.

password.description: The password of the owner of the cluster.
